state.goal: Analyse the current implementation of sindarin, create different permutations of sindarin programs in the /tmp/ directory, compile and run them to be sure everything it is capable of right now works, do not add any language features merely test to be sure everything works as expected, if you find issues, introduce a failing test to isolate the problem, then make the test pass. If your sinarin does not compile, be sure the syntax is correct before making code changes.

plan.goal: Analyse the current implementation of sindarin, create different permutations of sindarin programs in the /tmp/ directory, compile and run them to be sure everything it is capable of right now works, do not add any language features merely test to be sure everything works as expected, if you find issues, introduce a failing test to isolate the problem, then make the test pass. If your sinarin does not compile, be sure the syntax is correct before making code changes.
plan.analysis: This task requires understanding the Sindarin language capabilities by examining existing samples and documentation, then systematically creating test programs to exercise all language features, running them to verify correctness, and fixing any discovered issues with proper test coverage.

steps.description: Read existing sample files (samples/main.sn, samples/lib/lambda.sn) and any documentation to understand current language features and syntax
Examine the lexer, parser, and type checker source files to catalog all supported language constructs (types, operators, control flow, functions, etc.)
Create test programs in /tmp/ covering basic features: variable declarations, arithmetic operations, type annotations, and print statements
Create test programs for control flow: if/else statements, while loops, for loops, and nested control structures
Create test programs for functions: function declarations, parameters, return types, recursion, and arrow syntax
Create test programs for advanced features: string interpolation, lambdas/closures, arrays if supported, and any other discovered features
Build the compiler and systematically compile and run each test program, documenting any failures
For each failure found, determine if it's a syntax error in the test or a compiler bug by cross-referencing with working samples
Create minimal integration tests in compiler/tests/integration/ to isolate any discovered compiler bugs
Fix identified compiler bugs and verify all tests pass

plan.raw:
ANALYSIS: This task requires understanding the Sindarin language capabilities by examining existing samples and documentation, then systematically creating test programs to exercise all language features, running them to verify correctness, and fixing any discovered issues with proper test coverage.

PLAN:
1. Read existing sample files (samples/main.sn, samples/lib/lambda.sn) and any documentation to understand current language features and syntax | simple
2. Examine the lexer, parser, and type checker source files to catalog all supported language constructs (types, operators, control flow, functions, etc.) | medium
3. Create test programs in /tmp/ covering basic features: variable declarations, arithmetic operations, type annotations, and print statements | simple
4. Create test programs for control flow: if/else statements, while loops, for loops, and nested control structures | simple
5. Create test programs for functions: function declarations, parameters, return types, recursion, and arrow syntax | medium
6. Create test programs for advanced features: string interpolation, lambdas/closures, arrays if supported, and any other discovered features | medium
7. Build the compiler and systematically compile and run each test program, documenting any failures | medium
8. For each failure found, determine if it's a syntax error in the test or a compiler bug by cross-referencing with working samples | medium
9. Create minimal integration tests in compiler/tests/integration/ to isolate any discovered compiler bugs | medium
10. Fix identified compiler bugs and verify all tests pass | complex

TOTAL_STEPS: 10
